title: The Campaign: Foreign Policy
text:
Season 2 of Bret Baier's podcast, The Campaign, focuses on the most important topics to American voters and the effectiveness of how the candidates are campaigning on these issues.

Each week, we will hear from reporters across the country, along with a larger discussion about how all the candidates are doing in the polls and newsworthy moments from the campaign trail.

This week, Bret sits down with Dana Perino, Host of FOX News Channel's The Daily Briefing and Chris Stirewalt, FOX News Political Editor to discuss where the candidates stand on the issue of foreign policy.
